Indeed. luckily my summer job is settling down.  this was a particularly hard week - i lost six students due to failures.
ouch
it's a summer enrichment program, but some of the parentsthink of us as a summer outreach program, or even worse, 7 weeks of babysitting for $300.
They have to pass the first logic exam with a grade of 75 or higher, they get an opportunity to get a retake.  six didn't succeed on either.
of course, it adds 2 hrs/day extra ttuoring on my part, and I had to write/grade retests for 21 students.  So this week was especially busy for me.
Real life calls, as usual.
Anyway, enough about my troubles.
Feel free to vent anytime :-D
Have fun with the family!
